entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
